summary: TAKATA RECALL; I TOOK VEHICLE TO NORTHTOWNE LINCOLN MERCURY DEALERSHIP AND THEY TOLD ME THAT FORD HAS ISSUED A RECALL #16S26 FOR THE AIRBAG TO BE REPLACED BUT THEY HAVE NOT ISSUED ANY NEW PARTS TO THEM AND UNTIL THEY GET REPLACEMENT PARTS FROM TAKATA THERE IS NOTHING THEY CAN DO FOR ME EXCEPT TELL ME JUST TO KEEP DRIVING THE VEHICLE. I BOUGHT THE VEHICLE USED AND AS FAR AS I KNOW THE AIRBAG HAS NEVER DEPLOYED. I HAVE NEVER WRECK IT.
